attributes.action: to abolish all convictions for buggery. Being gay and having consensual sex is not a crime, and we demand you redress the injustice suffered by those who are still criminalised on the basis of an archaic law, which was repealed because it was discriminatory. Those victims who have had a conviction for buggery show up on their criminal record checks should have their names cleared and be given compensation.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

government_responses.details:
You signed a petition asking the Prime Minister to to abolish all convictions for buggery. Being gay and having consensual sex is not a crime, and we demand you redress the injustice suffered by those who are still criminalised on the basis of an archaic law, which was repealed because it was discriminatory. Those victims who have had a conviction for buggery show up on their criminal record checks should have their names cleared and be given compensation.

Her Majesty's Government has responded to that petition and you can view it here: 

http://www.hmg.gov.uk/epetition-responses/petition-view.aspx?epref=GayEquality


Her Majesty's Government
